description: Each week on the Life.Church podcast, you’ll hear teaching from senior pastor Craig Groeschel or a Life.Church pastor. Get practical, relevant, biblical perspectives on topics that matter to you. Visit us at www.life.church or download the Life.Church app.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Is there something painful in your past or present, and you’re not sure what to do? In Isaiah 53:3, the Bible describes Jesus as a man of suffering, familiar with pain. He’s experienced abuse—He’s been there. In this message, we’re talking about what to do when past hurts still hurt.

Everyone has worth and value from God, so no one deserves to experience abuse. Use these resources to find hope, freedom, or healing today: https://www.life.church/gethelp

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever been hurt by a friend? Jesus has. Maybe you feel like God isn't listening? Jesus knows what that’s like. No matter what you’re facing, Jesus understands because He’s Been There.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

CONNECT WITH A PASTOR

Do you need prayer? Would you like to find out how you can get involved at Life.Church? One of our pastors would love to meet with you. Schedule a video call with a pastor: https://www.life.church/meetwithus

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church

Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app

FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/life.church

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/life.church

items.title: When Past Hurts Still Hurt | Been There | Part 5

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
The Bible says God won't allow us to be tempted beyond what we can bear (1 Corinthians 10:13). Sometimes that seems impossible—especially when temptation is so strong. Like you, Jesus has been there. He faced the most intense temptation anyone has ever known, but He never sinned. In this message, we’re learning how to resist temptation like Jesus.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever been hurt by a friend? Jesus has. Maybe you feel like God isn't listening? Jesus knows what that’s like. No matter what you’re facing, Jesus understands because He’s Been There.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

items.title: When the Urge Is Too Strong | Been There | Part 4

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Is there an area of your life where you’re ready to quit? Even though it might feel like you have to endure this difficult time alone, you don’t. Jesus knows what it’s like to feel frustrated and discouraged—He’s been there. And this message could be the encouragement you need to keep going. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever been hurt by a friend? Jesus has. Maybe you feel like God isn't listening? Jesus knows what that’s like. No matter what you’re facing, Jesus understands because He’s Been There.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

CONNECT WITH A PASTOR

Do you need prayer? Would you like to find out how you can get involved at Life.Church? One of our pastors would love to meet with you. Schedule a video call with a pastor: https://www.life.church/meetwithus

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church

Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app

items.title: Ready to Quit | Been There | Part 3

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Sometimes one of the most challenging parts of faith is waiting for God. It might be hard to imagine, but Jesus knows what it’s like to wait. He understands the frustration you feel. In this message, we’ll learn how to trust God while we wait. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever been hurt by a friend? Jesus has. Maybe you feel like God isn't listening? Jesus knows what that’s like. No matter what you’re facing, Jesus understands because He’s Been There.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

CONNECT WITH A PASTOR

Do you need prayer? Would you like to find out how you can get involved at Life.Church? One of our pastors would love to meet with you. Schedule a video call with a pastor: https://www.life.church/meetwithus

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

items.content:encodedSnippet:
Sometimes one of the most challenging parts of faith is waiting for God. It might be hard to imagine, but Jesus knows what it’s like to wait. He understands the frustration you feel. In this message, we’ll learn how to trust God while we wait. 
ABOUT THIS MESSAGE
Have you ever been hurt by a friend? Jesus has. Maybe you feel like God isn't listening? Jesus knows what that’s like. No matter what you’re facing, Jesus understands because He’s Been There.

items.title: Why Is God So Slow? | Been There | Part 2

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Are there areas of life you’re constantly trying to control? In Proverbs 3:5, the Bible tells us to trust in the Lord with all of our heart. But how is that possible? In this Easter message, we’re learning how to give up the illusion of control and trust God. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever been hurt by a friend? Jesus has. Maybe you feel like God isn't listening? Jesus knows what that’s like. No matter what you’re facing, Jesus understands because He’s Been There.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

items.title: Stop Controlling That | Been There | Part 1

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
When life storms in and you're facing something you don't understand, panic can overwhelm you. But it's possible to find peace in your panic. We're learning how in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Are you facing something so overwhelming that only a miracle can change it? Do you even believe in miracles? They've happened before and can happen again. Let's experience them together in our new series, Miracles.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

CONNECT WITH A PASTOR

Do you need prayer? Would you like to find out how you can get involved at Life.Church? One of our pastors would love to meet with you. Schedule a video call with a pastor: www.life.church/meetwithus

items.content:
In Matthew 17, Jesus said if we have the faith of a mustard seed, we can move mountains. But what if we don’t want to move a mountain? What if we just want the pain to stop or the relationship to heal? This message is full of encouragement to help us keep going. Don’t miss it! 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Are you facing something so overwhelming that only a miracle can change it? Do you even believe in miracles? They've happened before and can happen again. Let's experience them together in our new series, Miracles.

items.title: Your Miracle Requires Movement | Miracles | Part 2

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Are you waiting for a miracle? Maybe you have unanswered prayers, and you’re not sure God even cares. Let’s learn how to build our faith and trust God has good things in store for us in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Are you facing something so overwhelming that only a miracle can change it? Do you even believe in miracles? They've happened before and can happen again. Let's experience them together in our new series, Miracles.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Waiting for a Miracle | Miracles | Part 1

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
During The Power to Change, we’ve learned what we need to do to start godly habits and break bad ones. In this message, we’ll get the last piece of the puzzle and learn how consistency can make our results last for good! 

In Pastor Craig’s new book, The Power to Change, you’ll learn highly practical, biblical, and doable strategies so you can get out of the cycle of trying and transform your life. 

Get the book: https://go2.lc/getthepower

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Few things in life are more frustrating than knowing you need to change, trying to change, but not actually changing. It’s possible to find The Power to Change so you can start living the life you want. 

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: You in Five Years | The Power to Change | Part 6

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Everyone likes to win. It’s fun to win a game or a race. But how do you train for life? How do you train to win at things like marriage, health, or your relationship with God? We’re talking about it in this message. 

In Pastor Craig’s new book, The Power to Change, you’ll learn highly practical, biblical, and doable strategies so you can get out of the cycle of trying and transform your life. 

Get the book: https://go2.lc/getthepower

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Few things in life are more frustrating than knowing you need to change, trying to change, but not actually changing. It’s possible to find The Power to Change so you can start living the life you want. 

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

items.title: You Don’t Win By Trying | The Power to Change | Part 5

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
During The Power to Change, we’ve been talking about creating new habits to build lasting change. But what about those habits we need to break? The ones that might be holding us back from the life God wants for us. In this message, we’re learning how to break bad habits for good. 

In Pastor Craig’s new book, The Power to Change, you’ll learn highly practical, biblical, and doable strategies so you can get out of the cycle of trying and transform your life. 

Get the book: https://go2.lc/getthepower

Few things in life are more frustrating than knowing you need to change, trying to change, but not actually changing. It’s possible to find The Power to Change so you can start living the life you want.

items.title: Break the Cycle That’s Breaking Your Life | The Power to Change | Part 4

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
We don’t always see the potential in small beginnings, but God does. In Zechariah 4:10, the Bible tells us not to despise small beginnings because the Lord rejoices to see the work begin. In this message, you’ll learn how to begin creating habits that will change your life. 

In Pastor Craig’s new book, The Power to Change, you’ll learn highly practical, biblical, and doable strategies so you can get out of the cycle of trying and transform your life. 

Get the book: https://go2.lc/getthepower

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Few things in life are more frustrating than knowing you need to change, trying to change, but not actually changing. It’s possible to find The Power to Change so you can start living the life you want.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
This message was originally presented as a part of a series called Peace of Mind. Find out more about the series here: www.life.church/peaceofmind

Our current series, 30-Second Theology, can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Check out www.life.church/30secondtheology to find a location or attend Life.Church Online anytime.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes, we’re facing battles that no one else can see. Maybe it’s trying to move forward after loss or uneasiness about the future. What do we do when we don’t understand what we’re feeling and hope seems far away? In our series, Peace of Mind, we’ll learn how to fight our mental battles and find peace.

Take your next step towards peace: https://www.life.church/mentalhealth

Check out the Peace of Mind Bible Plan here: https://www.go2.lc/mentalhealthplan

Listen to the Finding Calm in the Chaos podcast series here: https://go2.lc/CalmintheChaosPlaylist

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.content:
Do you ever wonder why you make certain choices? Maybe you wanted to make a change in your life but just couldn’t stick to it. In this message, we’re getting to the bottom of why we do the things we do and learning how to overcome negative thoughts. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Few things in life are more frustrating than knowing you need to change, trying to change, but not actually changing. It’s possible to find The Power to Change so you can start living the life you want.

items.title: When You’re Sick of Being Stuck | The Power to Change: Part 1

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
No matter your age or relationship status, we all need friends who encourage us and point us toward Jesus. Do you have friends like that? If not, how do you find them? And how can you become that friend for someone else? Let’s learn how to find community together in this message. 

You were designed by God to live in community. Now is the perfect time to join a LifeGroup, where you can be real and belong. Find your people: https://www.life.church/lifegroups/

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

We believe the church isn’t a building—it’s people. And when each of those people knows who they are and what they believe, they can achieve incredible things together. In our new series, We Are the Church, let’s learn more about who we are and how we can work together to change the world.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Jesus didn’t come for the righteous, He came for sinners—for people in need. He performed miracles and transformed lives. How can we share the hope of Jesus with everyone we meet? Let’s find out in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

We believe the church isn’t a building—it’s people. And when each of those people knows who they are and what they believe, they can achieve incredible things together. In our new series, We Are the Church, let’s learn more about who we are and how we can work together to change the world.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

Are you stepping into the new year with excitement and anticipation? Or do you feel worn out and overwhelmed from the weight of the last year? No matter how you’re feeling, we have an opportunity to Start Fresh in 2023. Together, let’s learn how to make this year matter. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Are you stepping into the new year with excitement and anticipation? Or do you feel worn out and overwhelmed from the weight of the last year? No matter how you’re feeling, we have an opportunity to Start Fresh in 2023. Together, let’s learn how to make this year matter. 

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. items.title: The Best of 2022

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Have you ever had a moment become a meaningful memory? It might not have seemed significant at the time, but now you hold the memory close to your heart. In this Christmas message, we’re learning how to recognize and embrace treasured moments. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

I never thought this would happen ... I have no idea what to do next. Have you ever had a moment like that? You’re face to face with a choice that feels bigger than you, and how you respond might change your life. How do you know what to do? Together, let’s learn how to turn unexpected moments into Holy Moments.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/life.church

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/life.church

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@lifechurch

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/craiggroeschel

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/craiggroeschel

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@craiggroeschel

It’s Been a Busy Week, Merry Christmas! - 00:00

The Power of A Memory - 03:05

Mary and Joseph’s 100 Mile Journey - 08:06

The Lord Will Give You a Sign - 10:05

The Presence of Peace - 12:29

At This Very Moment - 17:36

The World’s Greatest Blessing - 20:19

Emmanuel is With You Now - 24:21

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
God chose shepherds to share the news that Jesus was born. Can you imagine how they felt? Humbled, inadequate, and insecure. How would you feel? What would you do if God asked you to do something big? In this message, we’re learning how a moment of boldness can change everything.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

I never thought this would happen ... I have no idea what to do next. Have you ever had a moment like that? You’re face to face with a choice that feels bigger than you, and how you respond might change your life. How do you know what to do? Together, let’s learn how to turn unexpected moments into Holy Moments.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

itunes.subtitle: God chose shepherds to share the news that Jesus was born. Can you imagine how they felt? Humbled, inadequate, and insecure. How would you feel? What would you do if God asked you to do something big? In this message, we’re learning how a moment of boldness can change everything.
itunes.summary: God chose shepherds to share the news that Jesus was born. Can you imagine how they felt? Humbled, inadequate, and insecure. How would you feel? What would you do if God asked you to do something big? In this message, we’re learning how a moment of boldness can change everything.

items.title: To Hell With Hesitation | Holy Moments: Part 3

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Have you ever had to let go of something you didn’t want to? It can be scary because you don’t have control anymore. In Proverbs 3:5, the Bible tells us to trust in the Lord with all of our heart, and not lean on our own understanding. But how is that even possible? Let’s find out what moments of surrender really look like. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

I never thought this would happen ... I have no idea what to do next. Have you ever had a moment like that? You’re face to face with a choice that feels bigger than you, and how you respond might change your life. How do you know what to do? Together, let’s learn how to turn unexpected moments into Holy Moments.

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Life Is Measured in Moments | Holy Moments: Part 2

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Sometimes, it’s hard to obey. You know what’s right, but in the moment, it can be tough to choose obedience to God. How can you learn to make choices that honor God even when it’s hard? In this message, we’ll learn how one moment of obedience can change our lives.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

I never thought this would happen ... I have no idea what to do next. Have you ever had a moment like that? You’re face to face with a choice that feels bigger than you, and how you respond might change your life. How do you know what to do? Together, let’s learn how to turn unexpected moments into Holy Moments.

NEXT STEPS

items.title: When It’s Hard to Obey | Holy Moments: Part 1

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Pastor Craig and Amy have been married for 31 years and have learned a lot about marriage, relationships, and intimacy. In this interview-style message, our pastors are answering relationship questions and sharing what makes their marriage strong so you can set yourself up for success in your relationships. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

How do I know if they’re marriage material? How do I know if I am? What does a healthy relationship look like anyway? There are so many questions to consider for lasting relationships. It's time for some real talk about relationships, marriage, and sex. You’re invited to Save the Date. 

Find guides, stories, and wisdom to help you find confidence, peace, and direction in any relationship here: https://www.life.church/betterrelationships/

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

Whoever finds God, finds life. It’s not just something nice to say—it’s true! In this message, we’ll hear stories of change from people in our church who’ve found hope, healing, and life in Jesus.

items.title: 3 Mindset Shifts for a Heart of Generosity | Overflow: Part 1

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you feel overwhelmed? You’re exhausted, and there’s no time to rest. The things you used to enjoy doing at home and work seem impossible now. Even though you might not be able to change your circumstances, it’s possible to find relief from burnout. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes, we’re facing battles that no one else can see. Maybe it’s trying to move forward after loss or uneasiness about the future. What do we do when we don’t understand what we’re feeling and hope seems far away? In our new series, Peace of Mind, we’ll learn how to fight our mental battles and find peace.

Take your next step towards peace: https://www.life.church/mentalhealth

Check out the Peace of Mind Bible Plan here: https://www.go2.lc/mentalhealthplan

Listen to the Finding Calm in the Chaos podcast series here: https://go2.lc/CalmintheChaosPlaylist

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

WORK_OF_ART: the Peace of Mind Bible Plan

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Are you or someone you know going through a difficult time? In this message, we’re learning how to seek healing from trauma. Take some time right now to rest and let God speak to your heart.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

items.content:
Ever stopped to think about why you were put on this Earth? Or about the dreams God's put inside you that you haven't pursued yet? You might feel like you don't have what it takes or you've waited too long, but there's a reason you still think about it. It matters. Let's find the courage to go after our dreams together and learn how to lead like it matters.

items.content:
Are you tired of failing to reach your goals? If you have a lot of good intentions but struggle to follow through, you won't want to miss this message. We're learning how to be consistent and achieve every goal God puts on our hearts.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called Pre-Decide. Find out more about the series here: www.life.church/predecide

Our current series, At the Movies, can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of our favorite messages—but you can check out www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

items.title: Growing in Consistency

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Chances are, you know some of “those” people—the ones who know everything about everything. How can you stop being offended by difficult people? How do you know if you are one of them? We’ll find out in this message.

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called No Offense. Find out more about the series here: www.life.church/nooffense

items.content:
God loves you. People say it all the time, but do you ever wonder if it's true? When we struggle with feelings of worthlessness and doubt, it can be hard to believe that we really matter to God. Let's discover more about God’s love together in this message.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you admire those long-time married couples who still have that newlywed spark? Do you wonder what their secret is? Maybe you doubt it’s even possible to keep your marriage commitments. Pastor Craig’s sharing three secrets to getting the marriage you want. No matter your relationship status, there’s something in this message for you. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

No one has all the answers. That’s why we need a variety of voices to help us grow. During our new series, Book Club, we’ll get fresh perspectives on identity, relationships, anxiety, and more from people who have been there and wrote the book on it.  

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.content:encodedSnippet:
Have you ever been told empty promises? It can be confusing and hurtful when someone you trust lets you down. Does God keep all of His promises? How can we know? We’ll find the answers together as we kick off Book Club with special guest Sadie Robertson Huff. 
ABOUT THIS MESSAGE
No one has all the answers. That’s why we need a variety of voices to help us grow. During our new series, Book Club, we’ll get fresh perspectives on identity, relationships, anxiety, and more from people who have been there and wrote the book on it.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you feel abandoned by God or wonder if He cares about you? If He really loves you, why do bad things keep happening in your life? In this message, we’ll learn what we need to remember on our worst days. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

It’s easy to think of doubt as a sign of weak faith. But it’s not. God isn’t afraid of our doubts, so we don’t have to be either. In our new series, Doubting God, we’re creating a space for the questions we’ve been afraid to ask. Together, let's discover how doubt can actually build our faith. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. items.contentSnippet:
Do you ever wonder if you’re too bad for God? Or maybe you’re searching for the meaning of life. Consider Jesus. In this message, we’ll ask some of life’s biggest questions—and the answer could change your life. 
ABOUT THIS MESSAGE
It’s easy to think of doubt as a sign of weak faith. But it’s not. God isn’t afraid of our doubts, so we don’t have to be either. In our new series, Doubting God, we’re creating a space for the questions we’ve been afraid to ask. Together, let's discover how doubt can actually build our faith. 
WE’RE OPEN

items.title: Am I Too Bad for God? | Doubting God: Part 5

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
In this message, we’re digging into a subject that hits close to home for many people. In fact, it’s one of the biggest reasons people leave the church—hypocrisy. We’re talking about what to do when Christians let you down and how you can heal from past hurts. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

It’s easy to think of doubt as a sign of weak faith. But it’s not. God isn’t afraid of our doubts, so we don’t have to be either. In our new series, Doubting God, we’re creating a space for the questions we’ve been afraid to ask. Together, let's discover how doubt can actually build our faith. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: When Christians Let You Down | Doubting God: Part 4

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you ever doubt that God could use someone like you? It can be hard to know how to deal with your insecurities. There is so much encouragement for you in this message. Don’t miss it! 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

It’s easy to think of doubt as a sign of weak faith. But it’s not. God isn’t afraid of our doubts, so we don’t have to be either. In our new series, Doubting God, we’re creating a space for the questions we’ve been afraid to ask. Together, let's discover how doubt can actually build our faith. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. items.title: Facing Your Insecurities | Doubting God: Part 3

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Some people are leaving Christianity over doubts about their faith or questions they can’t seem to answer. But it doesn’t have to be that way. In this message, we’re learning how to hold onto what’s true and build our faith.  

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

It’s easy to think of doubt as a sign of weak faith. But it’s not. God isn’t afraid of our doubts, so we don’t have to be either. In our new series, Doubting God, we’re creating a space for the questions we’ve been afraid to ask. Together, let's discover how doubt can actually build our faith. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

itunes.subtitle: Some people are leaving Christianity over doubts about their faith or questions they can’t seem to answer. But it doesn’t have to be that way. In this message, we’re learning how to hold onto what’s true and build our faith.

items.title: Leaving Christianity | Doubting God: Part 2

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
It’s easy to think of doubt as a sign of weak faith. But it’s not. God isn’t afraid of our doubts, so we don’t have to be either. In this Easter message, we’re creating a space to deal with doubt and address questions we’ve been afraid to ask. Together, let's discover how doubt can actually build our faith. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

It’s easy to think of doubt as a sign of weak faith. But it’s not. God isn’t afraid of our doubts, so we don’t have to be either. In our new series, Doubting God, we’re creating a space for the questions we’ve been afraid to ask. Together, let's discover how doubt can actually build our faith. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.title: Dealing With Your Doubt | Doubting God: Part 1

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you ever feel like you're all alone? Maybe you’ve been asking, “Does God care about me?” Here's the truth: God sees everything you do. He loves you and cares for you. If you need some encouragement, you won't want to miss this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.title: Hope for a Hopeless Situation | God Is: Part 6

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Sometimes it can feel like the only constant around us is change. But the Bible tells us God never changes. What does that mean for us, and why does it matter? We’re talking about it in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

itunes.summary: Sometimes it can feel like the only constant around us is change. But the Bible tells us God never changes. What does that mean for us, and why does it matter? We’re talking about it in this message.

items.title: Where to Turn When You're Frustrated | God Is: Part 5

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Did you know that holiness is mentioned 637 times in the Bible? It’s an attribute of God that many people don’t want to hear about, but it’s one we need the most. What’s so important about God’s holiness? We’ll find out in this message.  

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: The Message You Don't Want To Hear | God Is: Part 4

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Have you ever asked yourself, "Why does God love me?" The truth is, God loves you infinitely. But knowing it and believing it are two different things. If you’ve ever questioned God’s love, you won’t want to miss this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

items.title: When You Feel Like God Can’t Love You | God Is: Part 3

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
When you're facing something you don't understand, it's easy to let doubt and worry creep in. In this message, we’re learning how to stop worrying and trust God no matter what. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Living Without Worry | God Is: Part 2

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Sometimes it can feel like the weight of the world is on your shoulders. From everything going on in the world to personal struggles, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed. No matter what you’re facing, church is a safe place to bring your doubts and fears. In this message, Pastor Craig is sharing how to find hope when you’re hurting. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

items.content:encoded:
Sometimes it can feel like the weight of the world is on your shoulders. From everything going on in the world to personal struggles, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed. No matter what you’re facing, church is a safe place to bring your doubts and fears. In this message, Pastor Craig is sharing how to find hope when you’re hurting. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

When you see God Is _____ what comes to mind? How can any of us really know what God's like? Too often, we view Him from our limited perspective, but it doesn't have to be that way. Together, let's discover how to fill that space with truth. 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.content:
Is there something you’ve been tempted to give up on? What would happen if you refuse to quit? God has a special word of encouragement for you in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

What if becoming the person you want to be starts long before the moment you make a decision? Before you click "buy," before you take one more bite, or before you lash out at the people you love. Can the decisions you make today help you live the life you really want tomorrow? Let's learn together in our new message series, Pre-Decide. 

We’ve hand-picked articles, podcasts, and Bible Plans to help you learn how to make better choices in your life. Check out our Pre-Decide resources page to learn more!

items.content:

items.title: One Word That Will Change Your Life | Pre-Decide: Part 6

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Have you ever heard the saying, “Your best days are ahead of you”? What if your best days are now? Instead of constantly looking forward, we’re learning how to be present and experience what God has for us today.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes it feels like nothing is working. We can do all the right things and check all the boxes, but life seems to stay the same. How can we find the life we're longing for? Together, let’s discover A Better Way.

Learn more about A Better Way: https://www.life.church/abetterway

WE’RE OPEN

items.title: How to Be Fully Present

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you ever feel like you'd be happier if you could make a little more money, buy that car, or land that job? The Bible tells us it's more blessed to give than to receive. (Acts 20:35) But how is that possible? And how do you stop holding yourself back from being generous? We'll find out in this message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

What if becoming the person you want to be starts long before the moment you make a decision? Before you click "buy," before you take one more bite, or before you lash out at the people you love. Can the decisions you make today help you live the life you really want tomorrow? Let's learn together in our new message series, Pre-Decide. 

We’ve hand-picked articles, podcasts, and Bible Plans to help you learn how to make better choices in your life. Check out our Pre-Decide resources page to learn more! 

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Take Back Your Life | Pre-Decide: Part 1

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Whether you’re a Gen Zer, Boomer, Millennial, or Gen Xer, this bonus episode with Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is for you. Starting off with a game of generational slang and ending with a look back to mentoring relationships throughout Scripture, we’re discovering why having relationships with people older and younger than you just might be the most valuable thing you can do. 

This episode is from You’ve Heard It Said, Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. To find this episode and plenty more like it, you can subscribe on your favorite podcast platform, or get emails when new episodes release at www.life.church/yhis 

More About You’ve Heard It Said

Want more meaningful conversations? We started this story-driven podcast to help LifeGroups and friends reclaim their time together. Listen before meeting, then use your time to do what matters most—talking about the episode, praying, and making memories together. 

Join us as we have honest discussions about the things that matter to you, the struggles you’re facing, and the spiritual truths that can guide you to a deeper understanding of who God made you to be. 

And don’t just listen—our hope is that every episode inspires you to start a conversation with someone you care about. Check out the Show Notes to find a special Conversation Guide with questions, resources, and more to help you get started. Also, every season comes with a Bible Plan you can go through with your LifeGroup or friends using the Plans With Friends feature in the YouVersion App.

Check out the Show Notes to find a special Conversation Guide with questions, resources, and more to help you get started. Also, every season comes with a Bible Plan you can go through with your LifeGroup or friends using the Plans With Friends feature in the YouVersion App.
items.creator: interactive@life.church (Sermon)

itunes.author: Sermon
itunes.subtitle:
Whether you’re a Gen Zer, Boomer, Millennial, or Gen Xer, this bonus episode with Pastor Joakim Lundqvist is for you. Starting off with a game of generational slang and ending with a look back to mentoring relationships throughout Scripture, we’re discovering why having relationships with people older and younger than you just might be the most valuable thing you can do. 

This episode is from You’ve Heard It Said, Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. To find this episode and plenty more like it, you can subscribe on your favorite podcast platform, or get emails when new episodes release at www.life.church/yhis

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
If you’ve struggled to understand another generation, you’re not alone. But our God is the God of generations—He created us to live together in unity. What could happen if we looked past our generational differences and learned from each other?

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Tik Tok or Facebook. Mom jeans or skinny jeans. Cheugy or basic. If you’ve ever struggled to understand another generation, you’re not alone. What could happen if we looked past our differences to learn from each other?

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.content:
God loves you. People say it all the time, but do you ever wonder if it's true? Or maybe you wonder why He would love someone like you. The answer to these questions could change your life. Let's discover them together in this Christmas message. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever had a question so hard you wouldn’t even say it out loud? Or a doubt so big you didn’t feel like you could share it—especially at church? Maybe it’s time to ask the tough questions together in our new series, Ever Wonder Why?

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Does God Love me?

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
The Bible says God will never abandon us (Deuteronomy 31:6). So why are there times when God feels distant? And what do you do when you can't feel Him at all? Let's find out in our series, Ever Wonder Why?

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Have you ever had a question so hard you wouldn’t even say it out loud? Or a doubt so big you didn’t feel like you could share it—especially at church? Maybe it’s time to ask the tough questions together in our new series, Ever Wonder Why?

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Why should I trust God? | Ever Wonder Why: Part 4

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
The Bible tells us that with God, all things are possible (Matthew 19:26 NIV). But if that's true, why do you have unanswered prayers? Does it mean you did something wrong? Or that God doesn't care? Let's talk about it as we continue our series, Ever Wonder Why?

It's hard to sift through all of the information at our fingertips. How do we filter through it in a healthy way? Is it even possible to see the positive? Even in a complicated world, you can learn how to change your perspective and Write Your Own Headlines.

items.title: Crazy Faith Story | Michael Todd

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Forgiving someone who wronged you can be hard—it might even seem impossible. We’re learning what can happen when we unlock the power of forgiveness.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

From the latest headline to social media comments, to the person who just cut you off in traffic—there are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to respond differently to those around us? Together, let’s learn how to live with No Offense.

Learn more about No Offense: https://www.life.church/nooffense

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.content:encoded:
Do you often focus on the difficult or painful parts of your past? You might be dealing with bitterness. How can you let go and move forward with your life? We’re talking about it in this message.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

From the latest headline to social media comments, to the person who just cut you off in traffic—there are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to respond differently to those around us? Together, let’s learn how to live with No Offense.

Learn more about No Offense: https://www.life.church/nooffense

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: Dealing With “Those” People | No Offense: Part 2

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
In this bonus episode, you’ll get to hear a conversation with Pastor Amy Groeschel about how we can love people we disagree with, fight for unity, and develop humility. She also shares about the importance of relationships, which is the driving theme of her upcoming Sisters message. This episode is the first of two with Pastor Amy, and the second one will also feature her mentor of 22 years. That episode will be available exclusively on You’ve Heard It Said—Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. Subscribe to the podcast on your favorite platform and get the Conversation Guides at https://www.life.church/yhis
 

You’ll also want to mark your calendars for the 2021 annual Sisters Event. Find dates and times and learn more about Sisters at https://www.life.church/sisters

 

About You’ve Heard It Said
Want more meaningful conversations? We started this story-driven podcast to help LifeGroups and friends reclaim their time together. Listen before meeting, then use your time to do what matters most—talking about the episode, praying, and making memories together. 

Join us as we have honest discussions about the things that matter to you, the struggles you’re facing, and the spiritual truths that can guide you to a deeper understanding of who God made you to be.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
There are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to stop being offended and respond differently to those around us? In this message, we’ll learn how to live with No Offense.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

From the latest headline to social media comments, to the person who just cut you off in traffic—there are plenty of opportunities to be offended each day. But what if we decided to respond differently to those around us? Together, let’s learn how to live with No Offense.

Learn more about No Offense: https://www.life.church/nooffense

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/life.church

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/life.church

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/lifechurch

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you ever wonder if you’re praying the right way? Maybe you keep praying, but it feels like your prayers aren’t effective. In this message, we’re learning how to unlock the power of prayer. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes it feels like nothing is working. We can do all the right things and check all the boxes, but life seems to stay the same. How can we find the life we're longing for? Together, let’s discover A Better Way.

Learn more about A Better Way: https://www.life.church/abetterway

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
On this special, bonus episode, you’ll get to hear extended content from Pastor Craig about why we need a better way, what sparked his message series, A Better Way, and how we can have a healthier relationship with work and rest. This episode is the first in a 2-part miniseries to help you dive deeper into this series. Find the second episode, and others like it, at You’ve Heard It Said—Life.Church’s spiritual growth podcast for LifeGroups. To subscribe and get the Conversation Guide, visit https://www.life.church/yhis


About You’ve Heard It Said

Want more meaningful conversations? We started this story-driven podcast to help LifeGroups and friends reclaim their time together. Listen before meeting, then use your time to do what matters most—talking about the episode, praying, and making memories together. 

Join us as we have honest discussions about the things that matter to you, the struggles you’re facing, and the spiritual truths that can guide you to a deeper understanding of who God made you to be.

items.title: Bonus: Pastor Craig Shares About Why We Need a Better Way

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Do you ever feel like you’re too busy for what matters? You’re always feeling rushed and are burned out by the busyness of life. There’s A Better Way to live, and we’ll learn all about it in this message.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Sometimes it feels like nothing is working. We can do all the right things and check all the boxes, but life seems to stay the same. How can we find the life we're longing for? Together, let’s discover A Better Way.

Learn more about A Better Way: https://www.life.church/abetterway

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app. 

FIND US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/life.church

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sam Marin)
items.content:
Some things just go better together—like beans and rice. It’s the same with people. We all have a purpose, but we’re not meant to function alone. Let’s learn why biblical community and relationships are essential ingredients in our lives. 

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Some things just go better together. Like beans and rice. On their own, they serve a purpose. But together, they complement each other and create endless possibilities. It’s the same with people—we all have a purpose, but we’re not meant to function alone. Learn more in this new message! 

Learn more about Beans & Rice & Jesus Christ: https://www.life.church/media/beans-rice-jesus-christ/

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

Some things just go better together. Like beans and rice. On their own, they serve a purpose. But together, they complement each other and create endless possibilities. It’s the same with people—we all have a purpose, but we’re not meant to function alone. Learn more in this new message! 

Learn more about Beans & Rice & Jesus Christ: https://www.life.church/media/beans-rice-jesus-christ/

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
It’s hard to hear from God when you don’t know what to listen for, especially if you find yourself praying with caution. But He’s ready for you to give Him your boldest prayers, and wants you to understand what He has to say. In this message, join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover how to clear your mind and prepare your heart so you can be ready to hear from God.

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called Dangerous Prayers. Find out more about the series here: www.life.church/dangerousprayers

Our current series, At the Movies can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of your favorite messages—but you can head to https://www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or visit https://live.life.church to attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

items.title: Are Your Prayers Too Safe?

items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.content:
When you’ve had enough of being anxious, you might make some mistakes. Learn from the biblical figure Elijah how to avoid running yourself into the ground, shutting people out, focusing on the negative, and forgetting God in your anxiety. God speaks in the whispers: don’t be anxious for nothing when you’ve had enough!

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called Anxious for Nothing. Find out more about the series here: https://www.life.church/anxious

Our current series, At the Movies can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of your favorite messages—but you can head to https://www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or visit https://live.life.church to attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!

items.title: Battling Anxiety

items.author: interactive@life.church (Sermon)
items.content:
Have you ever wished you knew what to do when you feel hopeless? If you feel disconnected, hopeless, or you just know something is missing—it's not the end of your story. It's an opportunity to reconnect. To find hope. And to rediscover what you lost. Don’t miss out on this special message with Pastor Craig Groeschel.

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called What Your Life is Missing. Find out more about the series here: https://www.life.church/media/what-your-life-is-missing/

Our current series, At the Movies can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of your favorite messages—but you can head to https://www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or visit https://live.life.church to attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!

items.contentSnippet:
Have you ever wished you knew what to do when you feel hopeless? If you feel disconnected, hopeless, or you just know something is missing—it's not the end of your story. It's an opportunity to reconnect. To find hope. And to rediscover what you lost. Don’t miss out on this special message with Pastor Craig Groeschel.
This message was originally presented as a part of a series called What Your Life is Missing. Find out more about the series here: https://www.life.church/media/what-your-life-is-missing/
Our current series, At the Movies can only be seen at a Life.Church location or at Life.Church Online. Each week on YouTube, we’re highlighting one of your favorite messages—but you can head to https://www.life.church/atthemovies to find a location or visit https://live.life.church to attend Life.Church Online anytime. See you At the Movies!
NEXT STEPS
Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

items.title: What Your Life is Missing

items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel)
items.content:
Grace and truth are the cornerstones of the Gospel and Christianity. But here’s some truth: Sometimes, Christians get it wrong. And here’s some grace: Falling short is okay when you know the Savior. Join Pastor Craig Groeschel to discover why Christians can get it wrong, and what we can do to embrace the grace and truth that Christ offers to us.

This message was originally presented as a part of a series called In God We Trust. FInd out more about the series here:: https://www.life.church/ingodwetrust

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

items.author: interactive@life.church (Joakim Lundqvist, Craig Groeschel)
items.content:
Jesus calls people to follow Him, and knowing where He's headed will change everything. Let’s learn how to follow Jesus together.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

If you choose to follow someone for the rest of your life, don't you want to know where they're going? Jesus calls people to follow Him, and knowing where He's headed will change everything. In our new message, we’ll learn what Following Jesus in Today’s World really means.

Learn more about Following Jesus in Today’s World: www.life.church/media/following-jesus-in-todays-world

Start the Following Jesus in Today’s World Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/followjesus

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

items.author: interactive@life.church (Craig Groeschel, Michael Todd)
items.content:
What if the relationship God wants for you looks nothing like the relationship you want for yourself? It could be time to rip up your relationship goals list and find out what God has planned for you instead.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Relationships are complicated, but do they have to be? How do you know if your one is "the one"? Can a book as old as the Bible help relationships today? We’re talking about being single, dating, marriage, and more in our new series, Modern Romance.

Learn more about Modern Romance: www.life.church/modernromance

Start the Modern Romance Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/modernromance

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.

items.title: 3 Principles to Help Your Relationships

items.author: interactive@life.church (Mike Todd, Craig Groeschel)
items.content:
We all want to win in relationships, but it’s not always easy. During Modern Romance, we’re going back to the basics and learning three principles of relationship goals.

ABOUT THIS MESSAGE

Relationships are complicated, but do they have to be? How do you know if your one is "the one"? Can a book as old as the Bible help relationships today? We’re talking about being single, dating, marriage, and more in our new series, Modern Romance.

Learn more about Modern Romance: www.life.church/modernromance

Start the Modern Romance Bible Plan: www.go2.lc/modernromance

WE’RE OPEN

We’re continuing to monitor guidelines and best practices for gathering in a safe way. Learn more about everything we're doing to keep you safe and how you can help by using hand sanitizer, washing your hands often, and more: https://www.life.church/updates

Find a time and attend a service with us: http://www.life.church/locations

NEXT STEPS

Have you made a decision to follow Jesus? You may be wondering what’s next on your journey. We want to help! Let us guide you to your next steps in your walk with Christ: https://www.life.church/next

ABOUT LIFE.CHURCH

Wherever you are in life, you have a purpose. Life.Church wants to help you find your next step. Our hope is that your journey will include joining us at a Life.Church location throughout the United States or globally online at https://www.live.life.church. Find locations, videos, and more info about us at https://www.life.church or download the Life.Church app at https://www.life.church/app.
